issue.title: Cloudsim simulation runs much longer than battery life if stop service is not called

content.raw:
@{557058:08ef8b07-1500-4917-989c-89f91ce4beac} What sort of turnaround times are you seeing on runs?  During the qualifier, I never saw results in less than 8 hours  - even when calling the stop competition service after an hour -  and was told it was a result of the AWS teardown time.  The gazebo logs showed the simulator stopping after about 1.5 hours of real time, so the rest I figure was teardown.

[#!/osrf/subt/issues/319/cloudsim-runs-not-ending](#!/osrf/subt/issues/319/cloudsim-runs-not-ending)
content.html:
@Malcolm Stagg What sort of turnaround times are you seeing on runs? During the qualifier, I never saw results in less than 8 hours - even when calling the stop competition service after an hour - and was told it was a result of the AWS teardown time. The gazebo logs showed the simulator stopping after about 1.5 hours of real time, so the rest I figure was teardown.
